span.title: Base StructureDefinition for dateTime Type: A date, date-time or partial date (e.g. just year or year + month). If hours and minutes are specified, a time zone SHALL be populated. The format is a union of the schema types gYear, gYearMonth, date and dateTime. Seconds must be provided due to schema type constraints but may be zero-filled and may be ignored. Dates SHALL be valid dates.

tr.td: Notes or comments about the observation

a.title: Legend for this format

description.value: A model for observations, which are measurements or assessments made about a patient or subject. This model is used to represent various types of clinical observations.

definition.value: A model for observations, which are measurements or assessments made about a patient or subject. This model is used to represent various types of clinical observations.
The patient or subject to whom the observation applies.
A code that identifies the type of observation being made, such as a clinical measurement or assessment.
The value of the observation, which can be a quantity, a coded value, or a string.
The time or period during which the observation was made.
The status of the observation, indicating whether it is preliminary, final, etc.
The reason for the current status of the observation.
The individual or organization that performed the observation.
Components of the observation, which can include additional measurements or assessments related to the main observation.
A code that identifies the component of the observation.
The value of the component observation, which can be a quantity, a coded value, or a string.
An interpretation of the observation, such as normal, abnormal, etc.

short.value: Notes or comments about the observation

definition.value: Additional notes or comments related to the observation.
